actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer to questions submitted in connection with census or survey conducted under title 13, United States Code, shall not be applicable to any census taken under section 142 of such title.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Eliminates the criminal penalties imposed for failure of an individual to answer questions submitted in connection with a census of agriculture, irrigation, or drainage. (Adds 13 U.S.C. 225(e))

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer to questions submitted in connection with census or survey conducted under title 13, United States Code, shall not be applicable to any census taken under section 142 of such title.
